mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(r.RESV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESV_DATE,r.baby_no,r.resv_status,r.resv_no,p.pay_state from reservation r LEFT JOIN payment p on r.resv_no = p.resv_no where r.baby_no=(select baby_no from baby where baby_no=#{baby_no}) and r.resv_no = p.resv_no order by r.resv_date
select * from baby where parent_no=#{parent_no} and baby_no=#{baby_no}

select TO_CHAR(r.RESV_DATE,'YY/MM/DD') AS RESV_DATE, r.resv_status, d.dis_name from reservation r left join DIAGNOSIS b on r.resv_no = b.resv_no left join disease d on b.dis_code=d.dis_code where baby_no = #{baby_no} order by RESV_DATE DESC
select * from BODYINFO where baby_no=#{baby_no} ORDER BY BODY_DATE DESC
select * from TEMPORATURE where baby_no=#{baby_no} ORDER BY TEMP_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(BODY_NO),0)+1 FROM BODYINFO
insert into BODYINFO(body_no,body_height,body_weight,body_date,baby_no) values(#{body_no},#{body_height},#{body_weight},SYSDATE,#{baby_no})

SELECT NVL(MAX(TEMP_NO),0)+1 FROM TEMPORATURE
insert into TEMPORATURE(temp_no,temp_temp,temp_date,baby_no) values(#{temp_no},#{temp_temp},SYSDATE,#{baby_no})
